MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 08:32AM in the LL49 and LL51 and LL52 postcode of Criccieth, Porthadog and Garndolbenmaen after reports of a grounded overhead line. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:39AM on 16th February 2021
